message_1: Suppose you are using a Caesar cipher with a shift of 7 to encrypt the message "ATTACK AT DAWN". What will be the encrypted message?
message_2:
To encrypt the message "ATTACK AT DAWN" using a Caesar cipher with a shift of 7, we will shift each letter in the message 7 positions forward in the alphabet. Spaces and other non-letter characters remain unchanged.

A -> H
T -> A
T -> A
A -> H
C -> J
K -> R

D -> K
A -> H
W -> D
N -> U

So, the encrypted message will be "HAABJAR HA KDAU".
